Key: Yo, Itsuka. What a coincidence.
Oh, Tonomachi...

What the hell, man! You could greet me with a
little more enthusiasm, you bastard!

You're putting words in my mouth! Oh, come to
think of it. Tonomachi, what would you consider
the most important thing...?

Hm? The hell, Itsuka? The answer to that seems
obvious.
Obvious? What is it?
Of course. To me, the most important thing is...
Right?!

(Tonomachi glanced up at the sky, wearing
a grave expression. Then, he glared at me.)
...but I won't tell you.

You're not going to tell me?! Man, you are
no help―

Wait, wait, Itsuka-kun. This is what's most
important to me...
...Hm? Your cell?
(You'll be my lover forever, right?)

This! This is it! This is my idea of paradise!
Someone kind, a step-sister who loves her big
brother. This is what's most important to me!
...Right.

Huh? What's the matter, Itsuka? That was a
weak response. I just admitted what's most
important to me.
...No, never mind. I was wrong for asking.

Itsuka? Where you goin'? Hey! HEY! Itsuka!
IIIIITSUUUUKAAA! Where you goin'?! I'm not
done. Come on, you serious?! ITSUKA! COME BACK!

(I'm going to ignore Tonomachi's answer,
and continue searching.)
